title: Untitled [man pulling bell cord]
marks:
Inscription

on tissue and on back, in pencil: [
description: black ink on card; image of thin man wearing tall top hat, knickers and striped socks, pulling on a bell cord, with a glowing lantern at his feet; top corners of image rounded off with images of Christmas trees; text above and below image:  \"Merry Christmas / The Holzschuhs\"; pencil notes and marks at bottom (\"2-1/2\" / between marks\"); tissue paper overlay glued to top back of card
creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
